# flamingo-s3

<div style="text-align:center">
  <img style="width: 200px;image-rendering: -moz-crisp-edges;image-rendering: -o-crisp-edges;image-rendering: -webkit-optimize-contrast;-ms-interpolation-mode: nearest-neighbor;image-rendering: pixelated;" src="data:image/png;base64," alt="">

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/piobyte/flamingo-s3.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/piobyte/flamingo-s3)
[![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/piobyte/flamingo-s3.svg)](https://david-dm.org/piobyte/flamingo-s3)
[![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/piobyte/flamingo-s3.png)](https://codeclimate.com/github/piobyte/flamingo-s3)
![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/flamingo-s3.svg)
![MIT licensed](https://img.shields.io/github/license/piobyte/flamingo-s3.svg)

`flamingo-s3` is a [flamingo](https://github.com/piobyte/flamingo) addon to allow reading and converting images from aws [s3](https://aws.amazon.com/s3/) buckets.

# Installation

`npm i --save flamingo-s3`

# Documentation

see [flamingo-s3 docs](https://piobyte.github.io/flamingo-s3/index.html)

# Tutorials 

for basic installation and setup see [flamingo-s3/tutorial-usage](https://piobyte.github.io/flamingo-s3/tutorial-usage.html)
